answerText: A Season in Hell [or Une Saison en Enfer][10] A Season in Hell and "The Drunken Boat" were written by this French poet, an influence on the surrealists who had an affair with Paul Verlaine.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 7 | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This poem by the author of "The Drunken Boat" begins with the line, "Once, if my memory serves me well." For 10 points each: [10] Name this nine-part poem that features two sections titled "Delirium" and that depicts the speaker's descent into the underworld.
